extendedInfo.description: **Welcome to the official DJ HEC NICE mobile application**Download the DJ Hec Nice application FREE and stay connected and dancing to the hottest mixes in Merengue, Reggaeton, Salsa, Dembow, House, Reggae, Hip Hop and many other genres of music. Now you can fully enjoy all of DJ Hec Nice mixes on the go 24-7. *FREE*If you are a new artist then listen up. If you want your new single to be heard by thousands of people then contact DJ Hec Nice. Your track will have a stand along section as a new single hit. DJ Hec Nice was born and raised in Queens, New York. The New York native has made a name for himself. After years of hustling in NYC and learning the ropes, in 2003 DJ Hec Nice decided to bring his talents to South Florida. Working for popular prestigious entertainment companies, he was able to bless crowds with his skills at some of the biggest corporate events in South Florida. From there he decided to expand his talent and take over some of the hottest nightclubs in South Beach and Ft. Lauderdale.Heâs known for realizing that it takes dedication, understanding and putting your heart in every next beat you give to a crowdâ¦ âYou have to enjoy it as if you were in the crowdâ and always remember that DJing and entertaining isnât a hobby, It is a skill!!!Stay tuned as DJ Hec Nice will always make sure your application is updated with more of his new hot mixes.Follow DJ Hec Nice on Twitter: @djhecnice5 / www.facebook.com/djhecnice5www.djhecnice.com

reviews.title: Thee best app in 2012.
reviews.comment: DJ Hec Nice app deserve best new music app award this year. I have never listening to an app so good like this one. I can\'t see to atop plYing it all day. Awesome job DJ Hec Nice...kev

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: A friend of mine... Eddie, (who knows him personally) he recommend this app. This is just what you need to have the best upto date music out there. This app and a good sound system and you have an instant party..... Not to mention everyones gonna want to know who hooked up with the MUSIC.....
